name: Rocky Zone
description:
Falling rocks, incoming missiles, 'scary' enemies! Do you have what it takes to conquer them all? If yes, welcome to Rocky Zone! A place to test out one's true skill! Climb your way up to the top and you shall obtain victory, all the best and have fun!!! 

*Psss... use the ladders wisely!*

(Click in the window if the game is not responding at the very beginning)
